game.name: Train Simulator: San Diego Commuter Rail F59PHI Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Built by General Motors Electro-Motive Division, the F59PHI is most commonly used on passenger trains throughout North America. Most significantly, it was also the first train to meet California’s strict emission standards, a feature that has seen its use across North America.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Built by General Motors Electro-Motive Division, the F59PHI is most commonly used on passenger trains throughout North America.
